Package hotelproject.views

Class View

java.lang.Object
hotelproject.views.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddRoomTypeView, BookingsView, CustomersView, DeleteBookingView, DeleteCustomerView, DeleteRoomView, LoginView, MainPageView, MyPageView, NewBookingView, NewCustomerView, NewRoomView, NewUserView, RoomsView, UpdateBookingView, UpdateCustomerView, UpdateInfoView, UpdateRoomView, UsersView
public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class all views will extend to prevent code redundancy.

    • createButton

      protected javafx.scene.layout.StackPane createButton​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView buttonImgView, javafx.scene.control.Button button, double minWidth, double minHeight)
      Create a button with the image associated.
      Parameters:
      buttonImgView - path of the image associated to the button.
      button - the button concerned.
      minWidth - minimum width of the button.
      minHeight - minimum height of the button.
      Returns:
      a StackPane with the result to add to the scene.

    • createButton

      Parameters:

      idleUrl - the path of the idle image.
      hoverUrl - the path of the hover image.
      Returns:
      a Button object.

      Change a label design based on original label object, new font, size and color.
      Parameters:

      font - the font for the new label.
